ComicInfo.Summary: Dark Horse Presents #83 features a new story by the spectacular David Lloyd. "Lasting Impression," is a tale of murder, mystery, and blind justice. Keep the lights on! A lull in Eddie Campbell's titanic battle, Hermes versus The Eyeball Kid, as Hermes and Eyeball both realize the fight is about as fixed as it can get. Now no one knows who wins, who dies, and who lands in the laundry. Don't miss this! And in part 3 of "Buoy 77," João forces Zé to reveal the valuable buoy's location, but João discovers something far more hideous than the buoy, and it may just cost him his life.
ComicInfo.Title: Lasting Impression; Stick This Up Yer Keister, Angel of Death
ComicInfo.Writer: David Lloyd,Eddie Campbell,Robert Boyd,Siobhan Dodds,Wes Kublick,David Lloyd,Siobhan Dodds,Robert Boyd,Eddie Campbell,Wes Kublick
